sen.e: In "Heike Monogatari" (The Tale of the Heike), the scene in which Shigefusa felled TAIRA no Tsunemasa in the Battle of Ichi no Tani is described; also the scene in which he captures the fine horse Inoueguro (Kawagoeguro) with his quick action that TAIRA no Tomonori let loose is described; it is said that he dedicated the horse to the Cloistered Emperor Goshirakawa.

sen.e: After the fall of the TAIRA clan, TAIRA no Yoshimune, the eight years old of the son of TAIRA no Munemori was captured and was with Shigefusa; the scene, in which he sheds tears before Yoshimune is executed, is depicted in the book also.
